Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
RefillInterface, RoundObserver, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExpertGame
public class Game extends Object implements RoundObserver, RefillInterface, Serializable
This class represent the game itself, because it contains the game's logic. This class contains the players and the other game's object: the bag, mother nature and the sets of islands and clouds.
Author:
Dario d'Abate, Lorenzo Corrado
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(String nickPlayer, int numGamePlayers)
      Constructor of the class. It initializes the sets of players and add the first player. The first player choose the number of players for a game
      Parameters:
      nickPlayer - nickname of the first player that connects to the server
      numGamePlayers - Number of players for a game
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if it is passed a number of player that's neither 2 nor 3, or nickname's player is an empty string

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      public void addListener(PropertyChangeListener pcl)
      This method is used to register a GameHandler object as a listener of this Game object
      Parameters:
      pcl - GameHandler object

    • initGameConstants

      protected void initGameConstants(int numPlayer)

    • playerCanJoin

      public boolean playerCanJoin()
      Indicates whether a player can join a started game. This method has to be called in the server, for multiple games.
      Returns:
      true if a player can join a game, false otherwise

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String nickPlayer)
      Appends a player to the end of player's list. This is done if maximum number of player hasn't yet reached, otherwise the list of players is unchanged
      Parameters:
      nickPlayer - Player's nickname that joins a game
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if player's nickname is an empty string
      NullPointerException - if player's nickname is null

    • getNumPlayers

      public int getNumPlayers()
      Returns:
      player's number that has joined in a game

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      If all players have joined, this method sets up the playing field and initializes each player's game items.

    • setGameState

      public void setGameState(GameState state)

      protected void initRound()

      protected void putMotherNature()

      public void associatePlayerToCardsToBack(CardBack back, Player player)

    • associatePlayerToTower

      public void associatePlayerToTower(Tower color, Player player)

    • initEntrancePlayers

      protected void initEntrancePlayers()

    • bagToClouds

      public void bagToClouds()
      This method is invoked whenever the set of cloud tiles needs to be filled with students.
      Specified by:
      bagToClouds in interface RefillInterface
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - when there's at least one cloud tile that's not empty

    • cloudToBoard

      public void cloudToBoard(int idxChosenCloud)
      This method is invoked when the current player need to move students from a cloud tile to its board's entrance
      Parameters:
      idxChosenCloud - is the index of the cloudTile to be emptied
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - when it is passed an index which does not have a corresponding cloud in the cloud arrayList
      IllegalStateException - when a player has not moved all the students that has to move from the entrance

    • entranceToHall

      public void entranceToHall(Color colorStudentToBeMoved)
      This method is invoked by the current player to move a single student from its entrance to its hall. When the move is made, if the player does not have the professor of the specified color and has the most students of that color among all the players, then he gets the professor
      Parameters:
      colorStudentToBeMoved - color of the student to be moved
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when a player does not have a student of the specified color in his board's entrance
      IllegalStateException - when the hall of a board cannot accept a student of the specified color

    • hasMaxStudents

      protected boolean hasMaxStudents(Color color)
      Helper method used to determine if the current player has the maximum number of students, of the specified color, in the hall
      Parameters:
      color - color of student
      Returns:
      true if the current player has the maximum number of students among all players, false otherwise

    • takeBackProfessor

      protected void takeBackProfessor(Color color)
      Helper method used to move the professor of the specified color on the current player board. It removes the professor from the board of the player who held it up to that moment. If no one had that professor, the boards remain the same
      Parameters:
      color - color of the professor to be removed

    • entranceToIsland

      public void entranceToIsland(int idxChosenIsland, Color colorStudentToBeMoved)
      This method is invoked by the current player to move a single student from its board to an island tile
      Parameters:
      colorStudentToBeMoved - color of the student to be moved
      idxChosenIsland - index of the island to which the student will be moved
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - when it is passed an index which does not have a corresponding island tile in the archipelago arrayList
      IllegalArgumentException - when a player does not have a student of the specified color in his board's entrance

    • playCard

      public void playCard(int idxCard)
      Thi method is called when the current player have to play a card. It also sets the maximum number of island mother movement can travel.
      Parameters:
      idxCard - Index of the card chosen by the player
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when the index does not correspond to an existing card

    • setMovesMotherNature

      protected void setMovesMotherNature()
      This method is used every time a player has to move mother nature. It set the maximum number of island mother nature can travel

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      This method is used every time a player ends his turn. When the turn is an action, it sets the maximum number of island mother nature can travel. After this method, motherMovement() can be invoked

    • motherMovement

      public void motherMovement(int moves)
      Causes mother nature to move by as many positions as indicated by the parameter. It also changes the InfluenceCalculator on the island, then it tries to conquer the island if possible, and checks if it needs to merge the current island with the adjacent ones.
      Parameters:
      moves - indicates the number of island mother nature has to travel
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter is not greater than zero

    • checkInstantWinner

      protected void checkInstantWinner()
      This method notify GameHandler whenever a player win because he ran out of tower or because remains 3 groups of island. To GameHandler is passed the nickname of that player

    • mergeIslandTile

      public void mergeIslandTile()
      This method merge two or three adjacent islands with the same towers' color, it starts from the currentIsland and check if it is possible to merge first with the right and then the left island. If there are 3 unified islands group in the archipelago, the game ends without a winner

    • mergeTwoIsland

      protected void mergeTwoIsland(IslandTile adjacentIsland, IslandTile currentIsland, AdjacentIslands direction)
      This is a helper method, it helps to merge two adjacent islands with the same towers' color together reducing the size of the archipelago
      Parameters:
      adjacentIsland - The island adjacent to the first one
      currentIsland - The island with the mother nature on it
      direction - The direction where you check the merge

    • sumOfTwoIsland

      protected IslandTile sumOfTwoIsland(IslandTile islandOne, IslandTile islandTwo)
      This method add two islands together creating a new island with the same number of towers and students of the previous two islands
      Parameters:
      islandOne - first island to be summed
      islandTwo - second island to be summed
      Returns:
      The island as a result of the sum

    • cyclicNumber

      protected int cyclicNumber(int number)
      This method is a helper method that transforms an index in an appropriate index for out cyclic array
      Parameters:
      number - the number of the index
      Returns:
      the transformed number

    • alternativeWinner

      public String alternativeWinner()
      This method checks the winner of the game due to an alternative endgame condition. Called at the end of the round in which the last student was drawn from the bag or if a player runs out of assistant cards in his hand
      Returns:
      the name of the winning player

    • getCurrentIsland

      public IslandTile getCurrentIsland()
      Returns:
      the references to the island with mother nature on it

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Returns:
      the references to the current player

    • getMaxMovement

      public int getMaxMovement()
      Returns:
      the maximum number of island mother nature can travel

    • setMaxMovement

      public void setMaxMovement(int maxMovement)
      Set the maximum number of island mother nature can travel
      Parameters:
      maxMovement - maximum number of island mother nature can travel

    • getMotherNature

      public int getMotherNature()
      Returns:
      the island with mother nature on it

      public ArrayList<CloudTile> getCloudTiles()

      Returns:
      the set of cloud tiles
